duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide in-home case management and assistance for elderly and disabled individuals in the West Alabama region.
Coordinate and navigate healthcare resources and services for clients in need.
Advocate for and support clients in accessing state and community-based assistance programs.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals, family members, and other stakeholders to ensure comprehensive care for clients.
Conduct assessments, create care plans, and monitor the wellbeing of clients on a regular basis.
Maintain accurate documentation and adhere to ethical and legal standards in all aspects of case management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Nursing, or a closely related field (RN qualification accepted)
